package.json.content:
{
  "name": "vite_react_shadcn_ts",
  "private": true,
  "version": "2.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "prebuild": "node scripts/update-version.js",
    "build": "vite build",
    "build:dev": "vite build --mode development",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "node scripts/test-routine.js",
    "test:quick": "node scripts/code-validator.js",
    "validate": "node scripts/code-validator.js",
    "safe-edit": "node scripts/safe-edit.js",
    "validate:full": "node scripts/full-system-validation.cjs",
    "validate:components": "node scripts/component-integration-test.cjs",
    "validate:all": "npm run validate:full && npm run validate:components && npm run lint && npm run build",
    "fix:issues": "node scripts/auto-fix-issues.cjs"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@hookform/resolvers": "^3.10.0",

    "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area": "^1.2.9",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.2.5",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-slider": "^1.3.5",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.5",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.12",
    "@radix-ui/react-toast": "^1.2.14",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle": "^1.1.9",
    "@radix-ui/react-toggle-group": "^1.1.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-tooltip": "^1.2.7",
    "@supabase/supabase-js": "^2.95.3",
    "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.83.0",
    "@types/crypto-js": "^4.2.2",
    "@types/js-cookie": "^3.0.6",
    "@types/react-beautiful-dnd": "^13.1.8",

    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "cmdk": "^1.1.1",
    "crypto-js": "^4.2.0",
    "date-fns": "^3.6.0",
    "embla-carousel-react": "^8.6.0",
    "framer-motion": "^12.34.0",
    "input-otp": "^1.4.2",
    "js-cookie": "^3.0.5",
    "lucide-react": "^0.462.0",
    "next-themes": "^0.3.0",
    "react": "^18.3.1",
    "react-beautiful-dnd": "^13.1.1",
    "react-day-picker": "^8.10.1",
    "react-dom": "^18.3.1",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.61.1",
    "react-resizable-panels": "^2.1.9",

  "devDependencies": {

    "@types/react": "^18.3.23",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.3.7",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react-swc": "^3.11.0",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.21",
    "eslint": "^9.32.0",

    "globals": "^15.15.0",
